title: Competency-Based Social Sector Practical Project Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in social studies fields
context.additional_context: Aims to Develop Competencies Through Project-Based Learning for Solving Real-World Social Issues. Operated in Parallel with Online Platforms and Offline Workshops

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world social issues to derive key problem areas
Learners can collaborate in teams to develop project proposals and present implementation strategies
Learners can design community-linked projects and produce outcome reports
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
